body.name: Gain Laundry Fabric Softener Liquid, Original Scent, 41 Fl Oz, 48 Loads, He Compatible, Pack Of 4, (Packaging May Vary)
features: IRRESISTIBLE SCENT: Smells as refreshing as a crisp morning in the great outdoors
INDULGENT SOFTNESS: Makes your clothes softer, decreases static and adds more amazing Gain scent
LONG-LASTING SCENT: Now with AromaboostTM for weeks of lasting freshness
FULL-LINE UP OF PRODUCTS: Available in matching scents across Laundry Detergent, Scent Booster Beads and Dryer Sheets
WORKS IN ALL MACHINES: Compatible with top load, front load, High efficiency (HE), or non HE
body.description: This is not your everyday fabric softener. This is pure liquid ahhhhmazing. With the irresistible combination of awe-inspiring scent and oh-so-indulgent softness found in Gain Original Fabric Softener, your laundry will feel as good as it smells. Let the self-hugging begin. And because of our incredible Aromaboost technology, you can indulge your senses for weeks of long lasting freshness. With Gain Original Fabric Softener you’re in for an experience that is so soft and so scenty, you’re sure to fall in love. For the same amazing scent, try Gain Original Flings Laundry Detergent, In-Wash Scent Booster Beads and Dryer Sheets too.

productInformation.value: #53,248 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #53 in Liquid Fabric Softener

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell
reviews.reviewText: Really like the thickness of the liquid and smell. Makes the clothes enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh Fragrance & Super Soft
reviews.reviewText: Gain original scent fabric softener does an outstanding job softening fabrics in the wash and has a light fresh fragrance that last without being overwhelming. It does a much better job and smells lighter then many of the scented fabric softeners on the market today. I've tried them all and find Gain Original to do the best job while having a light fragrance that lasts. It also costs much less. I liked it so well I subscribed for regular shipments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Great price!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the "Gain" fabric softener the Original Scent!! Leaves my clothes smelling wonderful and my clothes are so soft!! Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don't need any of the gain liquid detergent
reviews.reviewText: I used it for the laundry softner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price, free bottle and heavenly scent
reviews.reviewText: Buying this was like getting a free bottle of softener - for the price, you can’t beat it. And I love the Gain smell and softness. Always a great product. Add the scent beads and you just feel like you’ve sunken into a scent heaven of sorts. And honestly, using on my animals bedding? It makes them smell so fab when they’ve been sleeping on anything washed with again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Gain to me is 2nd right behind Tide. I usually buy whichever has a special going on at the time of purchase and saw this, now a days as I am a little older try to buy things in bulk if it saves me a few bucks, by older mean I am only 26. Scent is ok, works as it should helps keep cloths soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Invest in Smiles.
reviews.reviewText: The scent and softness this leaves on your clothes is really nice and when I smell it on my clothes (the scent is long lasting, like a couple weeks or more), it always makes me smile. It’s a relaxing, springtime smell that reminds me of a calm meadow. The scent is not too strong, but if I close my eyes, for a minutes I can escape the stress of my hectic day.A toasty towel or sweater smells so much more inviting when you add this to your wash. It’s kind of my guilty pleasure, something I do for me, but funny thing, I ran out a few weeks ago, and my husband complained that his shirts didn’t smell clean and asked I’d had one of the girls do the laundry. So, it’s not just me...and it’s back in stock at our house (yay, Amazon Prime!). A laundry product that can make you smile from time to time throughout the week is a worthwhile investment I think.
